verses.roman:
'vātula' nā ha-io, ghare rahata vasiyā
'kṛṣṇa' daraśana kariha kāli rātrye yāñā"

synonyms: vātula—mad; nā ha-io—do not become; ghare—at home; rahata—keep; vasiyā—sitting; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; daraśana—seeing; kariha—you may do; kāli—tomorrow; rātrye—at night; yāñā—going.
translation: "Do not become mad. Simply sit down here, and tomorrow night you will go see Kṛṣṇa."
